name: GRAVE DANGER (itch)
description:
""I knew camping in a G-g-graveyard was a B-bad idea!"

GRAVE DANGER

A Low-Rez-Micro-Strategy game.

You are incapacitated in a graveyard on the night of the GHOULIE UPRISING...

Collect WOOD and build a shoddy shelter to keep yourself safe.

Fend off GHOULIES as you make your last stand armed with your trusty BULLET shooting GUN. Use your KNIFE as a last resort.

  • MOUSE around to grab objects.
  • CLICK to grab/place wood, press SPACEBAR to rotate wood.
  • Click GHOULIES to use a BULLET and send them back to the GRAVE.
  • Find precious BULLETS, HEALTH, & WOOD and stay alive!
  • Click yourself to activate 'ineffective KNIFE attack'.
  • Protip: Skull-faced Ghoulies are known to EXPLODE.
